title: Dead Poets Society (Captioned)
creator_credit: Touchstone Pictures, Steven Haft, Paul Junger Witt, Tony Thomas and Peter Weir
brief_description: When charismatic English professor John Keating (Robin Williams) arrives at a strict boys academy, his unconventional teaching methods breathe new life into the curriculum steeped in tradition. With his wit and wisdom, Keating inspires his students to pursue individual passions and make their lives extraordinary. (Awards: Academy Award winner for Best Original Screenplay)
